title: Winter Storm Bringing Up to 18 Inches of Snow to Vermont | Flipboard
text: Winter Storm Bringing Up to 18 Inches of Snow to Vermont New England residents are battening down the hatches for a winter storm that will arrive Friday night into Vermont. Maine resorts have put out the … More stories from [New England](/topic/newengland) More stories from [Vermont](/topic/vermont) [Winter storm warning - Map shows 17 states on snow alert as up to 18ins to fall](/topic/vermont/winter-storm-warning---map-shows-17-states-on-snow-alert-as-up-to-18ins-to-fall/a-WHcqko4vTsuEPqpwWttPSQ%3Aa%3A4018046277-ae1acf6a02%2Fthe-express.com) Winter weather warnings are in effect for parts of 17 states as two distinct storm systems promise heavy snowfall across New England and northern … [Vermont Ski Resort Reopens Chairlift After Receiving Nearly Two Feet Of Snow](/topic/vermont/vermont-ski-resort-reopens-chairlift-after-receiving-nearly-two-feet-of-snow/a-AK2KI8nAQxKJuR2WToUONA%3Aa%3A1748307382-73e6a37a6d%2Fpowder.com) March Madness, indeed. Northeast ski resorts are having a moment as the snow stacks up. One benefit—among many—of the March powder bonanza is the … [Some US schools cancel classes ahead of April 8 solar eclipse to ensure safety](/topic/vermont/some-us-schools-cancel-classes-ahead-of-april-8-solar-eclipse-to-ensure-safety/a-fkotolVlQLid91QZwYDlyQ%3Aa%3A47769551-b17ad6affd%2Ffoxnews.com) Many schools across the U.S. are rethinking their class schedules for April 8, 2024 — the day a solar eclipse will hit North America. The eclipse’s line of totality — the areas where the sun will experience total coverage — will span 15 states, according to NASA.
